short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape emails from any web page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Email Scraper extension is designed to help users collect email addresses from web pages they have permission to access. Its primary use is for legitimate business and research purposes, such as market analysis, academic research, or networking. The extension simplifies the process of gathering publicly available email addresses into a structured format for easier management and analysis.
